text: Yonsei Law School (연세대학교 법학전문대학원) is one of the professional graduate schools of Yonsei University, located in Seoul, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the larger schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 120 students. ==History== It was formerly known as Yonsei University College of Law. == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Yonsei University Category:Law schools in South Korea ko:연세대학교 법학전문대학원
title: Yonsei Law School
